annotation: regular ocurrence of devoiced final vowels

language: East Sumbanese, Umbu Ratu Nggai dialect
Kadazan Dusun of Taginambur, Kota Belud, Sabah, Malaysia

annotation: (sic) baby, child (up to seven yrs. old)
Child, term of address to man
Children (pl. of tamaiti), be a child (Bse)

(10), ref. to Ata Laqei, Sed laqiʔ
child; offspring; childhood, youth; immature, young (Sma)
Child; term of address to man
